description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. The WORLD's #1 undead parkour racing simulator for your Xbox 360. Featuring funky fresh visuals, rockin' beats, and copious amounts of innuendo, this quirky new twist on a video gaming favourite is the full 'package'. Get BoneD or get lost!
